config.script:
try:
#		system.perspective.openPopup('LoaderPopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/Loader/LoaderPopup',draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)
		#-------------- Read Only Access restrictions ------------------------------------------------
		isReadOnly = self.session.custom.authorizeLineLeadConsoleReadOnly
		LLDataset = self.session.custom.LLDS
		system.perspective.print("LLDataset:"+str(LLDataset))
		if isReadOnly==1 or str(isReadOnly).strip().lower()=='true':
			self.getChild("root").getChild("AddProductionCount").props.enabled=0
			self.getChild("root").getChild("AddProductionCount").props.style.backgroundColor = str(self.session.custom.disableBtncolour)
			self.getChild("root").getChild("AddProductionCount").props.style.borderColor = str(self.session.custom.disableBtncolour)
			
			self.getChild("root").getChild("BtnSave").props.enabled = 0
			self.getChild("root").getChild("BtnSave").props.style.backgroundColor = str(self.session.custom.disableBtncolour)
			self.getChild("root").getChild("BtnSave").props.style.borderColor = str(self.session.custom.disableBtncolour)
			
			self.getChild("root").getChild("BtnApprove").props.enabled = 0	
			self.getChild("root").getChild("BtnApprove").props.style.backgroundColor = str(self.session.custom.disableBtncolour)
			self.getChild("root").getChild("BtnApprove").props.style.borderColor = str(self.session.custom.disableBtncolour)	
			
			self.getChild("root").getChild("NumericScrapFG").props.enabled = 0
			self.getChild("root").getChild("NumericContainersToApprove").props.enabled = 0		
		else:
			self.getChild("root").getChild("AddProductionCount").props.enabled = 1
			self.getChild("root").getChild("AddProductionCount").props.style.backgroundColor = "#3888CC"
			self.getChild("root").getChild("AddProductionCount").props.style.borderColor = "#3888CC"
			self.getChild("root").getChild("BtnSave").props.enabled = 1
			self.getChild("root").getChild("BtnSave").props.style.backgroundColor = "#3888CC"
			self.getChild("root").getChild("BtnSave").props.style.borderColor = "#3888CC"
			self.getChild("root").getChild("BtnApprove").props.enabled = 1	
			self.getChild("root").getChild("BtnSave").props.style.backgroundColor = "#3888CC"
			self.getChild("root").getChild("BtnSave").props.style.borderColor = "#3888CC"
			
			self.getChild("root").getChild("NumericScrapFG").props.enabled = 1
			self.getChild("root").getChild("NumericContainersToApprove").props.enabled = 1	
					
		#-------------- Read Only Access restrictions Ends Here ------------------------------------------------
		
		TtableData=self.params.rowData
		system.perspective.print("TtableData-->"+str(TtableData))
		woNo = TtableData.get('WorkOrderNo')
		PartNo = TtableData.get('PartNumber')
		ProductionQty=TtableData.get('PartNumber')
		LotNo = TtableData.get('LotNo')
		LineId = TtableData.get('LineId')
		self.session.custom.LineID = LineId
		userId=self.session.custom.UserId		
#		system.perspective.print("LineId--->"+str(LineId))
		AreaId = TtableData.get('AreaId')
		PlantId = TtableData.get('PlantId')
		EnterpriseId = TtableData.get('EnterpriseId')
		
		self.session.custom.AreaID = AreaId
		self.session.custom.EnterpriseId = PlantId
		self.session.custom.PlantID = EnterpriseId


		self.session.custom.LotNo=LotNo		
		ProductionQty=TtableData.get('ProductionQty')
		ReportBF=TtableData.get('ReportBF')
		WorkorderId=TtableData.get('WorkorderId')
		WorkorderNo = TtableData.get('WorkOrderNo')
		system.perspective.print("WorkorderId: "+str(WorkorderId))
		self.session.custom.IsQualitySaved=1
		
		NoOfCotainers = self.getChild("root").getChild("NumericContainersToApprove").props.value
		
		NoOfLotConsumption=NewQltyApprove.updateLLConsumption(WorkorderNo,WorkorderId,LineId,NoOfCotainers,LotNo)
#---------------------------------------------------Refresh Consumption-------------------------------------
		messageType1 = 'RefreshNoOfContainers'
		system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType1, payload = {"value":0,"SelctedRowIndex":0}, scope = "page")		
#-----------------------------------Remaining Containers--------------------------------------------

		RemainingContainer= ProductionOperatorConsole.getCollectedQtyofContainer(LotNo,woNo)
#		system.perspective.print("API Result---:"+str(RemainingContainer))
		for i in (RemainingContainer):
			RemainingContainerCount=i.get('total')
			if RemainingContainerCount==None:
				self.getChild("root").getChild("LblCompletedLotQty").props.text=0
			else:
				self.getChild("root").getChild("LblCompletedLotQty").props.text=RemainingContainerCount
#				system.perspective.print("RemainingContainerCount---->"+str(RemainingContainerCount))


#-------------------Write to Fileds------------------------------------------		
		self.getChild("root").getChild("LblWONo").props.text=woNo
		self.getChild("root").getChild("LblPartName").props.text=PartNo
		self.getChild("root").getChild("LblLotNo").props.text=LotNo
		SelectedLotNo = LotNo
		selectedWO = woNo

#-------------------Production Qty--------------------------------------------------
				
		LLRowCount = LLDataset.getRowCount()
		system.perspective.print('LLRowCount:'+str(LLRowCount))
		ProductionQtyTotal = 0
		for llRow in range(LLRowCount):	
		
			LotNo = LLDataset.getValueAt(llRow, 'LotNo')
			WorkOrderNo = LLDataset.getValueAt(llRow, 'WorkOrderNo')
			system.perspective.print("SelectedLotNo: "+str(SelectedLotNo))
			system.perspective.print("LotNo: "+str(LotNo))
			if LotNo==SelectedLotNo	and WorkOrderNo ==selectedWO:		
				ProductionQty = LLDataset.getValueAt(llRow, 'ProductionQty')
				ProductionQtyTotal = ProductionQtyTotal+ProductionQty
				
		system.perspective.print("ProductionQtyTotal: "+str(ProductionQtyTotal))							
		self.getChild("root").getChild("LblProductionQty").props.text=ProductionQtyTotal
		
		if ReportBF==False or ReportBF==0 or ReportBF=='False':
			msg="'Report BF' option is not selected in Packing"
			self.getChild("root").getChild("LblValidationMSG").props.text=msg
		else:
			self.getChild("root").getChild("LblValidationMSG").props.text=''
			
#--------------------Load To Table---------------------------------------	
	
#		WorkorderId=			
		revision=self.getChild("root").getChild("LblPartRev").props.text
		partNo=PartNo
		partNoWithoutFactory1= partNo.split("_")
		partNoWithoutFactory= partNoWithoutFactory1[0]
		revision=partNoWithoutFactory1[1]
		factory=partNoWithoutFactory1[2]
		LineId=LineId
		ScrapByFG=self.getChild("root").getChild("NumericScrapFG").props.value
		UserId=self.session.custom.UserId				
		screenNo=4
		paradetails={"screenNo":screenNo,"WorkorderId":WorkorderId,"partNo":partNo,"factory":factory,"revision":revision,"partNoWithoutFactory":partNoWithoutFactory,"ScrapByFG":ScrapByFG}
		system.perspective.print("paradetails-->"+str(paradetails))
		qualityScrapHistory=NewQltyApprove.getLineLeasdScrapHistory(screenNo,WorkorderId,partNo,factory,revision,partNoWithoutFactory,LineId,UserId,ScrapByFG,LotNo)
		system.perspective.print("API Result qualityScrapHistory-->"+str(qualityScrapHistory))
		self.getChild("root").getChild("TblReportScrap").props.data=qualityScrapHistory
		messageType1 = 'refreshLLScrap'
		system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType1, payload = {"value":0,"SelctedRowIndex":0}, scope = "page")
		system.perspective.closePopup("LoaderPopup")		
	except:
		import sys, os
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		errorMessage = "'Exception :: Line Lead Console: ERP Backflush: On startup':"+ str(exc_obj) + "Code Line No: "+ str(lineno)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage+' || Line No :' + str(lineno))
		Authentication.exceptionLogger(errorMessage)

try:
		ProductionQty=self.getSibling("LblProductionQty").props.text
		ScrapByFg=self.props.value
		if ScrapByFg<= ProductionQty:
#			messageType1 = 'refreshLLScrap'
#			system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType1, payload = {"value":0,"SelctedRowIndex":0}, scope = "page")
			if ScrapByFg>0:
				self.session.custom.IsQualitySaved=0
			else:
				self.session.custom.IsQualitySaved=1
			
		else:
			self.props.value=0
			MessageText="Scrap By FG Should Not Be Greater Than Production Quantity"
			updaateStatus=0
			system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)		
		self.props.style.backgroundColor="#E4E1E1"
		
	except:
		system.perspective.print('Exception :: Scrap By Fg')
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		system.perspective.print(lineno)

lastactivity=self.session.props.lastActivity
	print("lastactivity: "+str(lastactivity))
	currenttime=system.date.now()
	print currenttime
#	system.date.getMinute(date)
	print currenttime

NoOfContainersToApprove=self.getSibling("NumericContainersToApprove").props.value
	ScrapByFG=self.getSibling("NumericScrapFG").props.value
	if NoOfContainersToApprove>0 or ScrapByFG>0 :
		self.props.value=0
		MessageText="Changes Are Not Saved. Do you Want To Proceed Without Saving The Changes?"
		updaateStatus=0
		system.perspective.openPopup('SaveLost','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/PopupSaveLost',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)		
	else:
		self.session.custom.WoNumber=''
		Tabledata=self.view.params.rowData
		self.session.custom.LineID = Tabledata.get('LineId')
		self.session.custom.PlantID= Tabledata.get('PlantId')
		self.session.custom.LineLeadOCBackBtnH=1
		system.perspective.navigate("/LineLeadConsole")

messageHandlers.script:
try:
		
		scrapVal=payload['value']
		selRow=payload['SelctedRowIndex']
		system.perspective.print("scrapVal: "+str(scrapVal))
		updatedValue=float(scrapVal)   
		selColumn='ScrapByUnit'
		dtSet=self.props.data    
		updateRowResultDs = {selColumn:updatedValue}    
		resultpyData = system.dataset.updateRow(dtSet,selRow,updateRowResultDs)        
		ds= system.dataset.toPyDataSet(resultpyData)    
		self.props.data=ds  
		system.perspective.print("MSG Handler Done for LL Add Update-->")  
	except Exception as e:
			system.perspective.print('Exception :msg Handler updatig PEA Scrap Value')
			exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
			errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
			system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
			lineno = tb.tb_lineno
			system.perspective.print(lineno)
			sys.exit()

config.script:
try:
		PrevTableData=self.view.params.rowData	
		WorkorderId = PrevTableData.get('WorkorderId')
		system.perspective.print("WorkorderId: "+str(WorkorderId))
		self.getSibling("NumericScrapFG").props.style.backgroundColor="#E4E1E1"
		self.getSibling("NumericContainersToApprove").props.style.backgroundColor="#E4E1E1"
		TableData=self.getSibling("TblReportScrap").props.data
		system.perspective.print("TableData: "+str(TableData))
		WorkorderNo=self.getSibling("LblWONo").props.text
		PartNo=self.getSibling("LblPartName").props.text	
		userId=self.session.custom.UserId

		MESLotNo=self.getSibling("LblLotNo").props.text
		LotNo=self.getSibling("LblLotNo").props.text
		ScrapByFG=self.getSibling("NumericScrapFG").props.value
		NoOfCotainers=self.getSibling("NumericContainersToApprove").props.value
		componentDetails=[]
		try:
			noofrecords=TableData.getRowCount()
		except:
			noofrecords=0
		system.perspective.print("noofrecord"+str(noofrecords))
		if noofrecords>0:
			for i in range(noofrecords):
				bomName=TableData.getValueAt(i, "BOM Name")
				revision=TableData.getValueAt(i, "Revision")
				description=TableData.getValueAt(i, "Description")
				uom=TableData.getValueAt(i, "UOM")
				unitUsage=TableData.getValueAt(i, "UnitUsage")
				scrapByUnit=TableData.getValueAt(i, "ScrapByUnit")
				system.perspective.print("scrapByUnit: "+str(scrapByUnit))
				scrapByFG=TableData.getValueAt(i, "ScrapByFG")
				totalConsumption=TableData.getValueAt(i, "TotalConsumption")
				totalScrap=TableData.getValueAt(i, "TotalScrap")
				lotNumber=TableData.getValueAt(i, "JE Lot")
				BomDetailsId=TableData.getValueAt(i, "BomDetailsId")
				mstItemId=TableData.getValueAt(i, "MstItemId")
				bomID=TableData.getValueAt(i, "BomID")
				LineId=TableData.getValueAt(i, "LineID")
				machineID=TableData.getValueAt(i, "MachineID")
				bobbinsId=TableData.getValueAt(i, "BobbinsId")
				headName=TableData.getValueAt(i, "HeadName")																													
				componentDetails1= {
								      "bomName": bomName,
								      "revision": revision,
								      "description":description,
								      "uom": uom,
								      "unitUsage":unitUsage,
								      "scrapByUnit": (scrapByUnit),
								      "scrapByFG": scrapByFG,
								      "totalConsumption": 0,
								      "totalScrap": totalScrap,
								      "lotNumber":lotNumber,
								      "bomDetailsID": BomDetailsId,
								      "mstItemId": mstItemId,
								      "bomID": bomID,
								      "lineID": LineId,
								      "machineID": machineID,
								      "bobbinsId": bobbinsId,
								      "headName": headName
								      
							   	 }							
				componentDetails.append(componentDetails1)
		system.perspective.print("componentDetails: "+str(componentDetails))		
		if ScrapByFG>0:
			LLFgScrap=NewQltyApprove.LineLeadScrapByFG(WorkorderNo,WorkorderId,LineId,ScrapByFG,MESLotNo)
			system.perspective.print("LLFgScrap API Result:"+str(LLFgScrap))			
		else:
			IsValid=1
			LLFgScrap=[]
			system.perspective.print("Scrap By FG Is 0  :")	
					
		SaveScrapLL=NewQltyApprove.LineLeadScrapByComponent(WorkorderNo,PartNo,LineId,componentDetails,userId,WorkorderId)
		system.perspective.print("Save scrap API Result:"+str(SaveScrapLL))
		Listofcomponent=[]
		for i in (LLFgScrap):
			IsValid = i.get("IsValid")
		if SaveScrapLL==1 and IsValid==1:
				messageType1 = 'refreshLLScrap'
				system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType1, payload = {"value":0,"SelctedRowIndex":0}, scope = "page")
				MessageText="Scrap Details Saved Successfully."
				self.getSibling("NumericScrapFG").props.value=0
				self.view.params.isSaved=1
				self.session.custom.IsQualitySaved=1
				updaateStatus=1
				system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)
					
		else:
			self.view.params.isSaved=0
			self.getSibling("NumericScrapFG").props.value=0
#			self.session.custom.IsQualitySaved=0
			updateStatus="Can not save the 'Scrap BY FG', As the consummed lot quantity is greater than the remaining lot quantity for below components"
			Listofcomponent=[]
#			Header=["Equipment Code","Component Name","Remaining Lot Quantity","Calculated Consumption","Qty to be Feed"]
			if ScrapByFG>0:
				for component in (LLFgScrap):
					EquipmentCode=component.get("EquipmentCode")
					Head=component.get("HeadName")
					ComponentName=component.get("ComponentName")
					RemainLotQuantity=component.get("RemainLotQuantity")
					TotalConsumedQty=component.get("LineLeadScrapByFG")
					QtyToBeFeed=(float(TotalConsumedQty)-float(RemainLotQuantity))
					MyPar=(EquipmentCode,Head,ComponentName,RemainLotQuantity,TotalConsumedQty,QtyToBeFeed)
					Listofcomponent.append(MyPar)
					Header=["Equipment Code","Head","Component Name","Remaining Lot Quantity","Calculated Consumption","Qty to be Feed"]
				message = system.dataset.toDataSet(Header,Listofcomponent)							
				system.perspective.openPopup('ComponentVal','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/PopupConsumptionScrapByFG',params={"message":message,"updateStatus":updateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)			
	except:
		system.perspective.print('Exception :: Save Scrap')
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		system.perspective.print(lineno)
		message={"Screen_Event Name":'Exception :: Save Scrap',"Function Name":'Save Scrap',"Error Line":lineno, "Error Msg":errorMessage}
		system.perspective.print(message)
		system.perspective.openPopup('ErrorDiagnostics','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/PopupErrorDiagnosis',params={"message":message},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)

transforms.code:
if value == True or value == 1 or str(value).strip().lower() == 'true':
		self.props.style.backgroundColor = "#3888CC"
		self.props.style.borderColor = "#3888CC"
	else:
		self.props.style.backgroundColor = str(self.session.custom.disableBtncolour)
		self.props.style.borderColor = str(self.session.custom.disableBtncolour)

	return value

messageHandlers.script:
try:
		system.perspective.print("================================================")
		system.perspective.print("Auto Save Scrap")
		self.getSibling("NumericScrapFG").props.style.backgroundColor="#E4E1E1"
		self.getSibling("NumericContainersToApprove").props.style.backgroundColor="#E4E1E1"
		TableData=self.getSibling("TblReportScrap").props.data
#		system.perspective.print("TableData: "+str(TableData))
		WorkorderNo=self.getSibling("LblWONo").props.text
		PartNo=self.getSibling("LblPartName").props.text	
		userId=self.session.custom.UserId
		WorkorderId=0
		MESLotNo=self.getSibling("LblLotNo").props.text
		ScrapByFG=self.getSibling("NumericScrapFG").props.value
		componentDetails=[]
		try:
			noofrecords=TableData.getRowCount()
		except:
			noofrecords=0
#		system.perspective.print("noofrecord"+str(noofrecords))
		if noofrecords>0:
			for i in range(noofrecords):
				bomName=TableData.getValueAt(i, "BOM Name")
				revision=TableData.getValueAt(i, "Revision")
				description=TableData.getValueAt(i, "Description")
				uom=TableData.getValueAt(i, "UOM")
				unitUsage=TableData.getValueAt(i, "UnitUsage")
				scrapByUnit=TableData.getValueAt(i, "ScrapByUnit")
#				system.perspective.print("scrapByUnit: "+str(scrapByUnit))
				scrapByFG=TableData.getValueAt(i, "ScrapByFG")
				totalConsumption=TableData.getValueAt(i, "TotalConsumption")
				totalScrap=TableData.getValueAt(i, "TotalScrap")
				lotNumber=TableData.getValueAt(i, "LotNumber")
				BomDetailsId=TableData.getValueAt(i, "BomDetailsId")
				mstItemId=TableData.getValueAt(i, "MstItemId")
				bomID=TableData.getValueAt(i, "BomID")
				LineId=TableData.getValueAt(i, "LineID")
				machineID=TableData.getValueAt(i, "MachineID")
				bobbinsId=TableData.getValueAt(i, "BobbinsId")
				headName=TableData.getValueAt(i, "HeadName")																													
				componentDetails1= {
								      "bomName": bomName,
								      "revision": revision,
								      "description":description,
								      "uom": uom,
								      "unitUsage":unitUsage,
								      "scrapByUnit": (scrapByUnit),
								      "scrapByFG": scrapByFG,
								      "totalConsumption": totalConsumption,
								      "totalScrap": totalScrap,
								      "lotNumber":lotNumber,
								      "bomDetailsID": BomDetailsId,
								      "mstItemId": mstItemId,
								      "bomID": bomID,
								      "lineID": LineId,
								      "machineID": machineID,
								      "bobbinsId": bobbinsId,
								      "headName": headName
							   	 }							
				componentDetails.append(componentDetails1)
#		system.perspective.print("componentDetails: "+str(componentDetails))
		SaveScrapLL=NewQltyApprove.LineLeadScrapByComponent(WorkorderNo,PartNo,LineId,componentDetails,userId)
		LLFgScrap=NewQltyApprove.LineLeadScrapByFG(WorkorderNo,WorkorderId,LineId,ScrapByFG,MESLotNo)
#		LLFgScrap=0
		if SaveScrapLL==1 and LLFgScrap==1:
			messageType1 = 'refreshLLScrap'
			system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType1, payload = {"value":0,"SelctedRowIndex":0}, scope = "page")
			MessageText="Scrap Details Saved Successfully."
			self.getSibling("NumericScrapFG").props.value=0
			self.view.params.isSaved=1
			self.session.custom.IsQualitySaved=1
			updaateStatus=1
			system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)
		else:
			MessageText="Fail To Save The Scrap Details For: "+str(WorkorderNo)
			self.view.params.isSaved=0
			self.getSibling("NumericScrapFG").props.value=0
			self.session.custom.IsQualitySaved=0
			updaateStatus=0
			system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)		
#		system.perspective.print("SaveScrapLL: "+str(SaveScrapLL))
			
	except:
		system.perspective.print('Exception :: Save Scrap MSg Handler')
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		system.perspective.print(lineno)

config.script:
#============================================================================================================================================================
#	Functinality: Container Backflush To ERP
#	Developer: Hari Mhasalekar
#	Modified On: 07/04/2023
#	Modification Reason:- For Remaining qty validation added te component name in validation MSG
#	Comment : Do Not Modify The code 
#=============================================================================================================================================================
	try:
#==================================================Call MSG Handler To save the Scrap Details==============================================================
#		messageType1 = 'Save&approve'
#		system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType1, payload = {"value":0,"SelctedRowIndex":0}, scope = "page")
#==========================================================================================================================================================
	
		RowData=self.view.params.rowData
		system.perspective.print('RowData :' + str(RowData))
		LineId=RowData.get('LineId')
		workorderNo=self.getSibling("LblWONo").props.text
		LotNo=self.getSibling("LblLotNo").props.text
		PartNo=self.getSibling("LblPartName").props.text
		UserId=self.session.custom.UserId		
		NoOfContainers=self.getSibling("NumericContainersToApprove").props.value
		IsSavedFrmQlty=self.session.custom.IsQualitySaved	
		RemainingContainer=self.getSibling("LblCompletedLotQty").props.text
		RemainingContainer=int(RemainingContainer)
			
		WorkorderNo=RowData.get('WorkOrderNo')
		WorkorderId=RowData.get('WorkorderId')
		LineId=RowData.get('LineId')
		NoOfCotainers=self.getSibling("NumericContainersToApprove").props.value
		LotNo=RowData.get('LotNo')
		apiparameters={"WorkorderNo":WorkorderNo,"WorkorderId":WorkorderId,"LineId":LineId,"NoOfCotainers":NoOfCotainers,"LotNo":LotNo}
		system.perspective.print("apiparameters: "+str(apiparameters))
						
		if NoOfContainers>0:
			if IsSavedFrmQlty==1:
				BackflushResult=NewQltyApprove.BackFlushToErp(workorderNo,LotNo,PartNo,UserId,LineId,NoOfContainers,WorkorderId)				
				system.perspective.print("BackFlush API Result: "+str(BackflushResult))
				if BackflushResult==1:
					messageType1 = 'refreshLLScrap'
					system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType1, payload = {"value":0,"SelctedRowIndex":0}, scope = "page")
					self.getSibling("NumericScrapFG").props.value=0				
					self.getSibling("NumericContainersToApprove").props.value=0
					MessageText="Container Approved Successfully."
					updaateStatus=1
					system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)					
					self.session.custom.IsQualitySaved=1
					if RemainingContainer==NoOfContainers:
						system.perspective.print("Navigate back to landing Page")
						system.perspective.navigate("/LineLeadConsole")
					else:
						system.perspective.print("Continoue to approve Next Container")
#===========================================================uncomment below Lines 32,33,34,35,36 Once Backflush APi Returns 3 Successfully======================================================
				elif BackflushResult ==2:								
					self.getSibling("NumericContainersToApprove").props.value=0
					MessageText="Only Production Report Payload is Generated, Because Consumption is not selected from packing."
					updaateStatus=1
					system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)					
#===================================================================================================================================================================================================
				else:
					self.getSibling("NumericScrapFG").props.value=0				
					self.getSibling("NumericContainersToApprove").props.value=0
					MessageText="Fail To Approve The Containers."
					updaateStatus=0
					system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)									
			else:

				MessageText="Before Approve The Container, Please save The Scrap."
				updaateStatus=0
				system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)					
		else:
			MessageText="Please Enter The No Of Containers."
			updaateStatus=0
			system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)								
	except:
		import sys, os
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		errorMessage = "'Exception :: Line Lead Console: ERP Backflush: Approve Button':"+ str(exc_obj) + "Code Line No: "+ str(lineno)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage+' || Line No :' + str(lineno))
		Authentication.exceptionLogger(errorMessage)
#		MessageText="Container component quantity should be less than remaining component quantity"
		message={"Screen_Event Name":'Exception :: Approve',"Function Name":'Approve',"Error Line":lineno, "Error Msg":errorMessage}
		system.perspective.openPopup('ErrorDiagnostics','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/PopupErrorDiagnosis',params={"message":message},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)

transforms.code:
isReadOnly = self.session.custom.authorizePDALineSideStorageReadOnly
	if str(value) != str('0') and (isReadOnly==0 or str(isReadOnly).strip().lower()=='false'):
		value = True
		self.props.style.backgroundColor = "#3888CC"
		self.props.style.borderColor = "#3888CC"
	else:
		value  = False
		self.props.style.backgroundColor = str(self.session.custom.disableBtncolour)
		self.props.style.borderColor = str(self.session.custom.disableBtncolour)
	return value

config.script:
try:
	#--------------------Load To Table---------------------------------------		
			woNo=self.getSibling("LblWONo").props.text				
			revision=self.getSibling("LblPartRev").props.text
			partNo=self.getSibling("LblPartName").props.text	
			partNoWithoutFactory1= partNo.split("_")
			partNoWithoutFactory= partNoWithoutFactory1[0]	
			factory= partNoWithoutFactory1[2]	
			scrapByFG=self.props.value
			TotalConsumption=self.getSibling("LblTotalLotQty").props.text
			qualityScrapHistory=ProductionOperatorConsole.getQualityScrapHistory(woNo,partNo,factory,revision,partNoWithoutFactory,scrapByFG)
			system.perspective.print("API Result qualityScrapHistory-->"+str(qualityScrapHistory))
			self.getSibling("TblReportScrap").props.data=qualityScrapHistory	
	except:
		system.perspective.print('Exception :: Quality PEA Ok')
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		system.perspective.print(lineno)

try:
		self.getSibling("LblSaving").meta.visible=1
		RowData = self.view.params.rowData		
		WorkorderNo=RowData.get('WorkOrderNo')
		WorkorderId=RowData.get('WorkorderId')
		LineId=RowData.get('LineId')
		NoOfCotainers=self.props.value
		RemainingContainers=self.getSibling("LblCompletedLotQty").props.text		
		LotNo=RowData.get('LotNo')
		APIparameters={"WorkorderNo":WorkorderNo,"WorkorderId":WorkorderId,"WorkorderId":WorkorderId,"LineId":LineId,"NoOfCotainers":NoOfCotainers,"LotNo":LotNo}
		system.perspective.print("APIparameters---:"+str(APIparameters))
		if NoOfCotainers<=RemainingContainers:
			NoOfLotConsumption=NewQltyApprove.updateLLConsumption(WorkorderNo,WorkorderId,LineId,NoOfCotainers,LotNo)
			system.perspective.print("NoOfLotConsumption---:"+str(NoOfLotConsumption))
			for Consumption in NoOfLotConsumption:
				IsValidConsumption = Consumption.get("IsValid")
				system.perspective.print("IsValidConsumption: "+str(IsValidConsumption))
			if IsValidConsumption==1:	
				system.perspective.print("NoOfLotConsumption: "+str(NoOfLotConsumption))
				messageType1 = 'refreshLLScrap'
				system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType1, payload = {"value":0,"SelctedRowIndex":0}, scope = "page")
				MessageText="Scrap Details Saved Successfully."
				updaateStatus=1
#				system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)
			else:
				Listofcomponent=[]
				for component in (NoOfLotConsumption):
					EquipmentCode=component.get("EquipmentCode")
					Head=component.get("HeadName")
										
					ComponentName=component.get("ComponentName")
					RemainLotQuantity=component.get("RemainLotQuantity")
					TotalConsumedQty=component.get("TotalConsumedQty")
					self.getSibling("NumericScrapFG").props.value=0				
					self.getSibling("NumericContainersToApprove").props.value=0	
					QtyToBeFeed=(float(TotalConsumedQty)-float(RemainLotQuantity))
					MyPar=(EquipmentCode,Head,ComponentName,RemainLotQuantity,TotalConsumedQty,QtyToBeFeed)
					Listofcomponent.append(MyPar)
					Header=["Equipment Code","Head","Component Name","Remaining Lot Quantity","Calculated Consumption","Qty to be Feed"]
				message = system.dataset.toDataSet(Header,Listofcomponent)					
#					MessageText="Can Not Approve The container as Consumed Qty for Component: "+str(ComponentName) +(" Is More Than Remaining Qty.     \nConsumed Qty: ")+str(TotalConsumedQty)+("     \nRemaining Qty: ")+str(RemainLotQuantity)
				updateStatus='Can not update consumption, As the consummed lot quantity is greater than the remaining lot quantity for below components:'
				system.perspective.openPopup('ComponentVal','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/PopupConsumptionScrapByFG',params={"message":message,"updateStatus":updateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)																	
				self.getSibling("LblSaving").meta.visible=0
		else:
			self.props.value=0
			MessageText="Container to BackFlush Should Not Be Greater Than No. Of Containers Approved By Quality."
			updaateStatus=0
			system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)		
			self.getSibling("LblSaving").meta.visible=0
		self.props.style.backgroundColor="#E4E1E1"
#		self.getSibling("LblSaving").meta.visible=0
		system.perspective.print('Saving Done :: Scaved The Consumption')
		#	self.getSibling("NumericContainersToApprove").props.style.backgroundColor="#FFFFFF"
	except:
		self.getSibling("LblSaving").meta.visible=0
		self.props.style.backgroundColor="#E4E1E1"
		system.perspective.print('Exception :: Quality SrapBy FG1')
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		system.perspective.print(lineno)

config.script:
try:
		system.perspective.closePopup('')
		messageType1 = 'refreshLLScrap'
		system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType1, payload = {"value":0,"SelctedRowIndex":0}, scope = "page")
		self.props.image.icon.path='material/sync'
		self.props.text='Refreshing'
		system.perspective.print("Refresh Done")
	except:
		system.perspective.print('Exception :: Quality Scrap Details')
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		system.perspective.print(lineno)

try:
		RowData=self.view.params.rowData
		WorkorderId=RowData.get('WorkorderId')
		WorkorderStatus=RowData.get('Status')
		
		LotNo =RowData.get('LotNo') 
		PartNo = self.getSibling("LblPartName").props.text
		ProdQty = self.getSibling("LblProductionQty").props.text
		if WorkorderStatus  != 'Completed':
			system.perspective.openPopup('ProductionCount','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ProductionCount',params={"WorkorderId":WorkorderId,"LotNo":LotNo,"PartNo":PartNo,"ActProd":ProdQty},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False, position = {'left':1230,'top':100})		
		else:
			system.perspective.print('Workorder is completed')
			MessageText="Workorder is completed from production, Can not add production count."
			updaateStatus=0
			system.perspective.openPopup('SaveUpdatePopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/SaveUpdatePopup',params={"MessageText":MessageText,"updaateStatus":updaateStatus},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)					
	except:
		system.perspective.print('Exception :: Quality SrapBy FG1')
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		system.perspective.print(lineno)

messageHandlers.script:
try:
#		system.perspective.openPopup('LoaderPopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/Loader/LoaderPopup',draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)	
		self.getChild("ImageLoader").meta.visible=1
		TtableData=self.view.params.rowData		
		system.perspective.print("TtableData-->"+str(TtableData))
		woNo = TtableData.get('WorkOrderNo')
		WorkorderId = TtableData.get('WorkorderId')
		PartNo = TtableData.get('PartNumber')
		LotNo = TtableData.get('LotNo')
		LineId = TtableData.get('LineId')
		userId=self.session.custom.UserId		
		system.perspective.print("LineId--->"+str(LineId))
		self.session.custom.LotNo=LotNo			
#-------------------Write to Fileds------------------------------------------		
#		self.getChild("root").getChild("LblWONo").props.text=woNo
		self.getChild("LblWONo").props.text=woNo
		self.getChild("LblPartName").props.text=PartNo
		self.getChild("LblLotNo").props.text=LotNo		
#--------------------Load To Table---------------------------------------	
#-----------------------------------Remaining Containers--------------------------------------------

		RemainingContainer= ProductionOperatorConsole.getCollectedQtyofContainer(LotNo,woNo)
		system.perspective.print("API Result---:"+str(RemainingContainer))
		for i in (RemainingContainer):
			RemainingContainerCount=i.get('total')
			if RemainingContainerCount==None:
				self.getChild("LblCompletedLotQty").props.text=0
			else:
				self.getChild("LblCompletedLotQty").props.text=RemainingContainerCount
				system.perspective.print("RemainingContainerCount---->"+str(RemainingContainerCount))
	
#		WorkorderId=woNo			
		revision=self.getChild("LblPartRev").props.text
		partNo=PartNo
		partNoWithoutFactory1= partNo.split("_")
		partNoWithoutFactory= partNoWithoutFactory1[0]
		revision=partNoWithoutFactory1[1]
		factory=partNoWithoutFactory1[2]
		LineId=LineId
		ScrapByFG=self.getChild("NumericScrapFG").props.value
		UserId=self.session.custom.UserId				
		screenNo=4
		paradetails={"screenNo":screenNo,"WorkorderId":WorkorderId,"partNo":partNo,"factory":factory,"revision":revision,"partNoWithoutFactory":partNoWithoutFactory,"ScrapByFG":ScrapByFG}
		system.perspective.print("paradetails-->"+str(paradetails))
		qualityScrapHistory=NewQltyApprove.getLineLeasdScrapHistory(screenNo,WorkorderId,partNo,factory,revision,partNoWithoutFactory,LineId,UserId,ScrapByFG,LotNo)
		system.perspective.print("API Result Line Lead ScrapHistory-->"+str(qualityScrapHistory))
		self.getChild("TblReportScrap").props.data=qualityScrapHistory
		system.perspective.closePopup("LoaderPopup")
	
		self.getChild("RefreshBtn").props.text='Refresh'
		self.getChild("RefreshBtn").props.image.icon.path=''
		self.getChild("LblSaving").meta.visible=0	
		self.getChild("ImageLoader").meta.visible=0
	except:
		self.getChild("ImageLoader").meta.visible=0
		system.perspective.closePopup("LoaderPopup")
		self.getChild("RefreshBtn").props.image.icon.path=''
		self.getChild("RefreshBtn").props.text='Refresh'
		self.getChild("LblSaving").meta.visible=0	
		system.perspective.print('Exception :: Line Lead Scrap Details')		
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		system.perspective.print(lineno)
		message={"Screen_Event Name":'Exception :: Line Lead Refresh',"Function Name":'Line Lead Refresh',"Error Line":lineno, "Error Msg":errorMessage}
		system.perspective.openPopup('ErrorDiagnostics','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/ValidationPopups/PopupErrorDiagnosis',params={"message":message},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)
